TITLE: OLULA DEL RIO TENNIS SCHOOL
WELCOME: Welcome to the Olula del Rio Tennis School
ENJOY:
Enjoy our modern facilities and our classes taught by tennis professionals. You can reserve courts and participate in our events and tournaments. Join up
 to our community of tennis lovers!
LARGE_TEXT: The club facilities are located in a unique environment of 5,000 m2 surrounded by large trees, a swimming pool, fourteen tennis courts, a 7-a-side soccer field, five paddle tennis courts, baskets and a new gym. This is attractive for any athlete, but it is much more than that. Our restaurant around the pool allows you to reconcile social life with sports. Theme parties, Christmas, etc. To this you must add the peace of mind of parents when there is no school with the club's wild card. Your children will enjoy the outdoors at summer school, Christmas school and sports days.

DASHBOARD.WHY_CHOOSE: Why choose Club de Tenis Olula del Rio
DASHBOARD.WHY_CHOOSE_BODY: Choose Club de Tenis Olula del Río for our modern facilities, professional coaches, and a community passionate about tennis. Enjoy personalized classes tailored to your level and goals, ensuring effective training to improve your game. Participate in exciting tournaments that foster a competitive and stimulating environment. Join a community dedicated to tennis excellence, where each member is valued and supported on their journey to improvement and enjoyment of the sport.
DASHBOARD.TENNIS_SCHOOL_BODY: Start a new era of Tennis at Olula del Rio! Practice this wonderful sport with us in a fun, motivating, professional, healthy, and beneficial way.
DASHBOARD.COURT_RESERVATION_BODY: Reserve courts in Olula del Río to enjoy first-class facilities, a spectacular natural environment, and impeccable maintenance.
DASHBOARD.FACILITIES_BODY: Our facilities in Olula del Río include 2 high-quality tennis courts, a pool, and green areas for relaxation. We also have 3 padel courts, a football 7 field, and a cozy restaurant to enjoy after the game. All this in a well-kept natural environment that promotes well-being and sports activity.
